long_description: J.Jill, Inc. operates as an omnichannel retailer for womenâ€™s apparel under the J.Jill brand name in the United States. The company offers knit and woven tops, bottoms, and dresses, as well as sweaters and outerwear; and complementary footwear and accessories, including scarves, jewelry, and hosiery. Its targeted customers are 45 years and older. The company markets its products through retail stores, Website, and catalogs. As of November 7, 2019, it operated 280 stores. J.Jill, Inc. was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Quincy, Massachusetts.
